body.p: In August 1997, IASC published proposals for revised treatments for intangible assets and goodwill in Exposure Drafts E60 Intangible Assets and E61 Business Combinations. This followed the publication of Exposure Draft E55 Impairment of Assets in May 1997, which set out detailed proposals for impairment testing.
